about.title: About
about.subtitle: Since 2010, Kiteriders has been helping students of all ages and skill levels experience the thrill and freedom of kitesurfing in the safest possible environment.

safety.title: Safety First Approach
safety.description: Our instructors are certified in first aid and water rescue, ensuring your safety is always the top priority.

certified.title: Certified Professional Instructors
certified.description: Learn from IKO and VDWS certified instructors with years of experience and passion for the sport.

groups.title: Small Group Sizes
groups.description: We maintain a 4:1 student-to-instructor ratio to ensure personalized attention and faster learning.

locations.title: Prime Locations
locations.description: Our school operates in spots with consistent winds and ideal conditions for beginners and advanced riders alike.

courses.title: Our
courses.subtitle: From absolute beginners to advanced riders looking to perfect their skills, we offer a range of courses tailored to your level and goals.

instructors.title: Our
instructors.subtitle: Meet our team of certified professionals who are passionate about kitesurfing and dedicated to helping you learn safely and efficiently.

gallery.title: Our
gallery.subtitle: Explore thrilling moments from our kitesurfing sessions and training camps.

testimonials.title: What Our
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from our community of kitesurfers who've learned with us.

booking.title: Book Your
booking.subtitle: Ready to catch some waves? Book your kitesurfing lesson now and start your adventure with our expert instructors.

cancellation.text: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before your session. Cancellations within 48 hours are subject to a 50% fee.

questions.q: How do I prepare for my first lesson?
questions.a: We recommend bringing swimwear, a towel, sunscreen, and a water bottle. All equipment is provided.

questions.q: What if the weather is bad?
questions.a: If weather conditions are not suitable, we'll reschedule your lesson at no additional cost.

downwind.description: Experience the thrill of long-distance kitesurfing along beautiful coastlines. Perfect for intermediate and advanced riders.

exploration.title: Spot Exploration
exploration.description: Discover hidden gems and secret spots with our experienced guides. Visit multiple locations in one exciting journey.

sunset.title: Sunset Sessions
sunset.description: Join our special evening sessions and experience kitesurfing during the most beautiful time of day.
